Package cams.user

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
cams.user.UserController
public class UserController extends Object
The UserController control is responsible for facilitating access to User credentials. It stores user table and staff table.

It follows the Singleton pattern to ensure a single instance throughout the application.

Since:
2023-11-23
Version:
1.0
Author:
Gillbert Susilo Wong, Juan Frederick, Karl Devlin Chau, Pascalis Pandey, Trang Nguyen

    • getInstance

      public static UserController getInstance(String studentPath, String staffPath)
      Gets the singleton instance of UserController and initiates student and staff list from passed parameters
      Parameters:
      studentPath - the path to the Excel file containing student information
      staffPath - the path to the Excel file containing staff information
      Returns:
      the singleton instance of the UserController

    • addUser

      public void addUser(User user) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a User object to the corresponding table
      Parameters:
      user - the user object associated with a User
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - when a User with the same userID already exists
